about_the_game:
Demon Slayer - Set in the year 2075, when dark demons have invaded the world and threaten all of humanity. You will play the role of the leader of a group of killers, whose goal is to destroy demons and collect their analyzes to ensure the survival of humanity. Explore dark levels filled with dangers and mysteries, where every battle becomes decisive in the struggle between humans and demons. Collect analyzes of defeated enemies to unravel their weaknesses and create new strategies for victory.

The game combines a mixture of 2D platformer and puzzle game.

The game offers you exciting battles, unique abilities and the ability to level up your character to improve his fighting skills. Immerse yourself in an atmosphere of darkness and magic, where every decision matters and every action can affect the outcome of the battle between good and evil.
